languages.text: Воздух наполняется снарядами. Стоит Жертве совершить первый выстрел, как стрелять начинают все и во всех. Эта хаотическая перестрелка охватывает всю улицу. Она бежит по Темному городу, словно пожар, дикая и бессмысленная.

The air fills with gunfire. As soon as the Prey fires the first shot, everyone starts shooting at everyone else. This chaotic firefight engulfs the entire street. It spreads across the Dark City like a wildfire, mindless and violent.
languages.original_text: Воздух наполняется снарядами. Стоит Жертве совершить первый выстрел, как стрелять начинают все и во всех. Эта хаотическая перестрелка охватывает всю улицу. Она бежит по Темному городу, словно пожар, дикая и бессмысленная.

traits.locale_text: The air fills with gunfire. As soon as the Prey fires the first shot, everyone starts shooting at everyone. This chaotic fire-fight engulf the entire street. It spreads across the Dark City like a wildfire, mindless and violent.

The air fills with gunfire. As soon as the Prey fires the first shot, everyone starts shooting at everyone else. This chaotic firefight engulfs the entire street. It spreads across the Dark City like a wildfire, mindless and violent.

languages.text: 空気が銃声で満たされる。獲物が最初の一発を撃つや否や、全員が互いに向かって撃ち始める。この闇雲な銃撃戦は通り全体を巻き込む。それはまるで山火事のように仄暗き都全体に広がり、見境がなく暴力的だ。
languages.original_text: The air fills with gunfire. As soon as the Prey fires the first shot, everyone starts shooting at everyone else. This chaotic firefight engulfs the entire street. It spreads across the Dark City like a wildfire, mindless and violent.

traits.locale_text: 空気が銃声で満たされる。獲物が最初の一発を撃つや否や、全員が互いに向かって撃ち始める。この闇雲な銃撃戦は通り全体を巻き込む。それはまるで山火事のように仄暗き都全体に広がり、見境がなく暴力的だ。

languages.text: 空气中充满了硝烟的味道。猎物开出第一枪之后，所有人都开始胡乱互相射击。这场混乱的交火吞没了整条街道，枪战像野火一样在黑暗之城蔓延，盲目而狂暴。
languages.original_text: The air fills with gunfire. As soon as the Prey fires the first shot, everyone starts shooting at everyone else. This chaotic firefight engulfs the entire street. It spreads across the Dark City like a wildfire, mindless and violent.

traits.locale_text: 空气中充满了硝烟的味道。猎物开出第一枪之后，所有人都开始胡乱互相射击。这场混乱的交火吞没了整条街道，枪战像野火一样在黑暗之城蔓延，盲目而狂暴。

languages.text: El aire se llena de disparos. En cuanto la presa lanza dispara el primer tiro, todo el mundo empieza a disparar a todo el que le rodea. El caótico tiroteo se extiende por toda la calle. Se propaga por la Ciudad Siniestra como un incendio, descontrolado y violento.
languages.original_text: The air fills with gunfire. As soon as the Prey fires the first shot, everyone starts shooting at everyone else. This chaotic firefight engulfs the entire street. It spreads across the Dark City like a wildfire, mindless and violent.

traits.locale_text: El aire se llena de disparos. En cuanto la presa lanza dispara el primer tiro, todo el mundo empieza a disparar a todo el que le rodea. El caótico tiroteo se extiende por toda la calle. Se propaga por la Ciudad Siniestra como un incendio, descontrolado y violento.

languages.text: Die Luft füllt sich mit dem Lärm von Schüssen. Sobald die Beute ihren ersten Schuss abfeuert, beginnen alle, auf alle anderen zu schießen. Die gesamte Straße ist von der chaotischen Schießerei erfüllt. Sie verbreitet sich wie ein Waldbrand in der Dunklen Stadt, gnadenlos und brutal.
languages.original_text: The air fills with gunfire. As soon as the Prey fires the first shot, everyone starts shooting at everyone else. This chaotic firefight engulfs the entire street. It spreads across the Dark City like a wildfire, mindless and violent.

traits.locale_text: Die Luft füllt sich mit dem Lärm von Schüssen. Sobald die Beute ihren ersten Schuss abfeuert, beginnen alle, auf alle anderen zu schießen. Die gesamte Straße ist von der chaotischen Schießerei erfüllt. Sie verbreitet sich wie ein Waldbrand in der Dunklen Stadt, gnadenlos und brutal.

languages.text: L'air résonne de tirs. Dès que la proie appuie sur la gâchette, tout le monde se met à tirer. Au rythme de la fusillade, le chaos, aussi violent et irrépressible qu'un incendie, se répand dans la rue, puis dans les rues environnantes, puis dans toute la Cité Crépusculaire.
languages.original_text: The air fills with gunfire. As soon as the Prey fires the first shot, everyone starts shooting at everyone else. This chaotic firefight engulfs the entire street. It spreads across the Dark City like a wildfire, mindless and violent.

traits.locale_text: L'air résonne de tirs. Dès que la proie appuie sur la gâchette, tout le monde se met à tirer. Au rythme de la fusillade, le chaos, aussi violent et irrépressible qu'un incendie, se répand dans la rue, puis dans les rues environnantes, puis dans toute la Cité Crépusculaire.

languages.text: Hava silah atışlarıyla doluyor. Av, ilk atışı yapar yapmaz herkes herkese saldırmaya başlıyor. Bu kaotik çatışma tüm sokağı etkisi altına alıyor. Tüm Kara Şehir'e yangın gibi akılsızca ve vahşice yayılıyor.
languages.original_text: The air fills with gunfire. As soon as the Prey fires the first shot, everyone starts shooting at everyone else. This chaotic firefight engulfs the entire street. It spreads across the Dark City like a wildfire, mindless and violent.

traits.locale_text: Hava silah atışlarıyla doluyor. Av, ilk atışı yapar yapmaz herkes herkese saldırmaya başlıyor. Bu kaotik çatışma tüm sokağı etkisi altına alıyor. Tüm Kara Şehir'e yangın gibi akılsızca ve vahşice yayılıyor.
